title: Membership
description: A relationship between a person and an organization

role.description: The role that the holder of the post fulfills

member.description: A reference to the person or organization that is a party to the relationship

person_id.description: The ID of the person who is a party to the relationship

person.description: The person who is a party to the relationship

organization_id.description: The ID of the organization that is a party to the relationship

organization.description: The organization that is a party to the relationship

post_id.description: The ID of the post held by the person in the organization through this membership

post.description: The post held by the person in the organization through this membership

area.description: The optional area with which this membership is associated

id.description: An identifier for the area, e.g. a URI

start_date.description: The date on which the relationship began

end_date.description: The date on which the relationship ended

start_reason.description: The reason why this relationship began

end_reason.description: The reason why this relationship ended

contact_details.description: Means of contacting the person who is a party to the relationship

links.description: URLs to documents about the membership
